articles.title: Why AI is women’s new power move
articles.description: Every generation of women has been promised liberation through technology. This time could actually be different.
articles.content: The narrative is familiar: Revolutionary technology arrives, promising to liberate women from domestic drudgery and professional constraints. The electric oven would free housewives from coal-burning stoves. The washing machine would eliminate laundr... [5581 chars]

articles.title: GIG hosts Assistive Tech Conference to advance accessible work in India
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent Jammu, Dec 1: Aimed to bring together innovators, corporates, researchers, disability-rights leaders and athletes to reimagine how technology can transform accessibility and inclusion at work, an Assistive Tech Conference 2025 organised by Godrej Industries Group (GIG) was inaugurated here today. Celebrating the International Day of Persons with Disabilities, the conference served as a collaborative platform for new ideas and partnerships that can accelerate India’s journey toward equitable workplaces. Speaking on the occasion, Parmesh Shahani, Head of Godrej DEI […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
Jammu, Dec 1: Aimed to bring together innovators, corporates, researchers, disability-rights leaders and athletes to reimagine how technology can transform accessibility and inclusion at work, an Assistive Tech Conference 2025... [1955 chars]

articles.title: Smart car technology weaponised by domestic violence abusers
articles.description: Features designed for convenience are increasingly being hijacked for sinister purposes.
articles.content:
Domestic violence abusers are weaponising smart car technology to control and terrorise their victims, turning connected vehicles into “weapons on wheels”, authorities warn.
The eSafety Commissioner has reported a surge in calls to the tech abuse sup... [1616 chars]
